Astronomy Tower Landing.name: Astronomy Tower Landing
Astronomy Tower Landing.description: You are on a landing in the Astronomy Tower. In the west wall is a blue door with a bronze knocker set into it. A spiral staircase winds up and down.

Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage.description: The statue creakily walks a pace towards you to expose a hole in the floor. It seems to be a very dark tunnel.
Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage.wrong_password: The statue's single eye fixes on you displeasedly.
Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage.name: Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage
Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage.password_prompt: You approach the singularly ugly statue, apparently of Gunhilda of Gorsemoor. You have the impression that the statue is waiting for you to say something.

paths.w: Entrance to the One-Eyed Witch's Passage

WestThirdEWCorr.name: WestThirdEWCorr
WestThirdEWCorr.description: You are at the western end of a third-floor corridor. The paintings are of blast-ended skrewts. In a nook in the far western corner is a statue of a one-eyed, humpbacked witch. The corridor extends to the east.

Top of Astronomy Tower.name: Top of Astronomy Tower
Top of Astronomy Tower.description: You are out on the roof of the Astronomy Tower. The view is spectacular. A stairway goes down.

SEGreatHall.name: SEGreatHall
SEGreatHall.description: You are in the SE corner of the Great Hall. This corner is lit by floating candles. You are near the ends of the Gryffindor and Ravenclaw tables. There is a stairway going up in the south wall and a door to the east. The Great Hall extends to the north and west.

Myrtle's Bathroom.description: You are in a disused girls' lavatory on the second floor. Someone is crying messily in one of the stalls. The sinks are arrayed in a curious circle, and the circular floor tile in the center of the sink-circle looks like it moves. The exit is to the east.
Myrtle's Bathroom.name: Myrtle's Bathroom

Flying.name: Flying
Flying.description: You are soaring above the Quiddich pitch! The castle's tall astronomy tower is far to the north.

East Library.name: East Library
East Library.description: You are in the main section of the library. Stacks of books lie scattered on tables and comfy chairs that are perenially dappled with late afternoon sunshine. The restricted section is to the west and there is a broad archway to the north through which you can glimpse stairs leading down and stripes of green, yellow, red, and blue.

Slytherin Common Room.description: You are in the Slyterin Common Room. There are windows that appear to look out into the lake. Glowing green orbs float in midair. Tapestries covered in snakes and grumpy looking old men line the walls. Exit is to the north.
Slytherin Common Room.wrong_password: The door grates on its hinges as it shouts, 'BEGONE'!
Slytherin Common Room.name: Slytherin Common Room

Potions Classroom.name: Potions Classroom
Potions Classroom.description: You are in the Potions classroom. Herbs hang from the ceiling. There is a general air of misery. The door is to the north.

Ravenclaw Common Room.name: Ravenclaw Common Room
Ravenclaw Common Room.description: You are in the Ravenclaw Common Room. The ceiling is high, domed, and painted blue. You can hear wind whipping past the tall, arched windows. The door is in the east wall.
Ravenclaw Common Room.password_prompt: The eagle-shaped knocker intones, Which came first, the phoenix or the flame?

Hufflepuff.name: Hufflepuff
Hufflepuff.description: You are in the Hufflepuff Common Room. It is full of overstuffed armchairs. There is a large tapestry on the east wall and a crackling fireplace on the west wall. The main exit is to the south.

Path to Hogsmeade.name: Path to Hogsmeade
Path to Hogsmeade.description: To your east is a set of imposing gates. They appear to be locked. The castle is behind them. You can just make out Hogsmeade at the end of the long path to your west. There is a hole in the ground below your feet.

Disused Room.name: Disused Room
Disused Room.description: You are in a disused classroom. Everything is coated with dust. The door is to the south.

SouthSecondNSCorr.name: SouthSecondNSCorr
SouthSecondNSCorr.description: You are at the southern end of a north-south corridor in Lion Tower. The paintings are of people arguing over a meal. There is a doorway to the west and a stairway on the east side going down. The corridor extends to the north.

Gryffindor.description: You are in the Gryffindor Common Room! The circular room is filled with large comfy armchairs. Scarlet and gold hangings line the walls. A fire crackles in the fireplace. There is a hole in the wall to the west.
Gryffindor.wrong_password: 'Sorry dear, that was last week. Or the week before. Run along now.'
Gryffindor.name: Gryffindor
Gryffindor.password_prompt: Dawn French coughs lightly and says, 'Password?'

EastThirdEWCorr.name: EastThirdEWCorr
EastThirdEWCorr.description: You are at the eastern end of a third-floor corridor. The paintings are landscapes. There is a door in the north wall and a staircase going down to the east. The corridor extends west.

West Library.name: West Library
West Library.description: You are in the restricted wing of the library. A chill, slightly ominous draft stirs dust motes in the air. There's a stairway going down to the north. The main section of the library is to the east.

Stair Hall.description: You are in grand hallway with many stairways that appear to be continuously moving. There is a large door in the south wall, a small door in the north wall, and a broad archway to the east.
Stair Hall.name: Stair Hall

NWGreatHall.name: NWGreatHall
NWGreatHall.description: You are in the NW corner of the Great Hall. The High Table is here, and the walls are hung with purple tapestries. There is a door to the west, behind the teachers' table. There is also an archway to the north. The Great Hall extends to the south and east.

NEGreatHall.name: NEGreatHall
NEGreatHall.description: You are in the NE corner of the Great Hall. There is a cleared area as if some event is supposed to go on here. A doorway lies behind a tapestry to the north, and a stairway in the east wall leads down. The Great Hall extends to the west and south.

Quidditch Pitch.name: Quidditch Pitch
Quidditch Pitch.description: You are on the Quidditch pitch. The goals and ribbon-festooned stands tower above you. A path leads away to the north.

WestSecondEWCorr.name: WestSecondEWCorr
WestSecondEWCorr.description: You are at the western end of a long east-west corridor in the North Tower. The paintings are of various knights posturing and winking. A stairway in the south wall leads down and the corridor extends east.

Lair of the Megan.description: In this room is kept an elliptical and a Megan. Piles of squalor completely obscure the floor. The exit to the north is barely visible through the squalor.
Lair of the Megan.name: Lair of the Megan

Hospital.name: Hospital
Hospital.description: You are in the hospital wing. Rows and rows of stark empty beds line the room. The exit is to the south.

Kitchen.name: Kitchen
Kitchen.description: You are in the castle kitchen. Pots are boiling, fires are crackling, and sinks bubbling. The main door is to the west.

Chamber of Secrets.name: Chamber of Secrets
Chamber of Secrets.description: You are in the Chamber of Secrets. Tall pillars carved over with snakes stretch upward almost out of sight. Channels of mirror-still water line the north and south walls. A large, carved, grimacing face covers the west wall. The exit is east.

Chute.name: Chute
Chute.description:
You slide down the dark chute and land in front of a door covered with elaborate snake carvings. When you repeat the hissing noise you made upstairs, the snakes writhe and the door swings open.
The Chamber of Secrets has been opened!

Headmaster's Tower.name: Headmaster's Tower
Headmaster's Tower.description: You are in a small octagonal room in the Headmaster's Tower. A passageway leads south. A staircase that is more of a ladder disappears through a trapdoor in the ceiling. A door-sized gargoyle is on the east wall.

NorthSecondNSCorr.name: NorthSecondNSCorr
NorthSecondNSCorr.description: You are at the northern end of a north-south corridor in Lion Tower. There is a portrait of Dawn French on the eastern wall. A passage leads north and a narrow stairway is to the west.

Filch's Office.name: Filch's Office
Filch's Office.description: You are in a small, spotless room. A filing cabinet stands in the corner and a discontented cat hisses at you from the floor. The door is to the south.

Headmaster's Office.name: Headmaster's Office
Headmaster's Office.description: You are in the Headmaster's Office. It is a spacious circular room filled with odd whirling noisy instruments. A rotating spiral stairway leads down.

Owlery.description: You have climbed to the Owlery. The floor is cluttered with feathers and small bones. There is a gap under the eaves for owls to come and go. A ladder goes down.
Owlery.name: Owlery

Astronomy Tower Hall.name: Astronomy Tower Hall
Astronomy Tower Hall.description: You are on a low level of the Astronomy Tower. Paintings of starry skies line the walls. A spiral staircase winds up and down, and there are passageways to the north and south.

Third Floor Corridor.description: You are in a non-descript third-floor corridor. There is a passage to the west and a door in the south wall.
Third Floor Corridor.name: Third Floor Corridor

CentralSecondEWCorr.name: CentralSecondEWCorr
CentralSecondEWCorr.description: You are in the middle of a long east-west corridor in the North Tower. The paintings are of disappointed horses. This corridor extends east and west. Another corridor goes south, and stairways lead up and down from here.

EastSecondEWCorr.name: EastSecondEWCorr
EastSecondEWCorr.description: You are at the eastern end of a long east-west corridor in the North Tower. The paintings are of drunk centaurs. There is a disused classroom to the north, and a stairway to the east. The corridor extends to the west.

South Basement Corridor.name: South Basement Corridor
South Basement Corridor.description: You are at the southern end of a basement corridor. It is decidedly less pleasant here than the northern end. The walls are covered with foul slime. A heavy door is in the south wall. Emerald green gems light the stairway leading down.

Gargoyle.description: The gargoyle swings out to reveal a stone spiral staircase going up..
Gargoyle.wrong_password: The gargoyle continues to survey you impassively.
Gargoyle.name: Gargoyle
Gargoyle.password_prompt: You can't be sure, but the gargoyle seems to blink at you as you approach it.

North Basement Corridor.name: North Basement Corridor
North Basement Corridor.description: You are at the northern end of a basement corridor. The hall is filled with the smell of baking bread. The kitchens are through a low archway to the east and there is a circular door in the wall to the north. There is a stairway in the west wall and the corridor extends to the south.

Pitch Black Tunnel.description: You are in a long dark tunnel.
Pitch Black Tunnel.name: Pitch Black Tunnel

Castle Gates.name: Castle Gates
Castle Gates.description: You are inside the Hogwarts main gates. The castle is to the west. You can just make out Hogsmeade down a long easterly path through the gates. The gates are locked.

Emerald Hall.name: Emerald Hall
Emerald Hall.description: You are in a hall encrusted with emeralds. An ebony door is set into the southern, gem-like wall. A grimy passageway leads east. A green-lit stairway goes up.

The Quad.name: The Quad
The Quad.description: You are standing outside in the cloistered courtyard of a wizarding school in Scotland. The entrance to the castle is to the north. Paths lead east, west, and south.

Dungeons.name: Dungeons
Dungeons.description: You are in the dungeons. They have obviously not been used or cleaned in a very long time. Slime appears to be oozing from the walls. You are seized by a strong urge to leave to the west.

Headmaster's Stairs.name: Headmaster's Stairs
Headmaster's Stairs.description: You are on a tightly wound stone spiral staircase that noiselessy moves under your feet and you switch floors efforlessly. If you lift your foot up, it moves you up and vice versa.

Dark Tunnel.description: You are in a long dark tunnel.
Dark Tunnel.name: Dark Tunnel

Lightless Tunnel.description: You are in a long dark tunnel.
Lightless Tunnel.name: Lightless Tunnel

Trophy Room.name: Trophy Room
Trophy Room.description: You are in the trophy room. You can't see much through the glare of yellow light reflecting from the hundreds of trophies. The main door is to the west.

SWGreatHall.description: You are in the SW corner of the Great Hall. The Slytherin and Hufflepuff tables end in this corner. There is a broad archway in the west wall and the Great Hall extends to the north and east.
SWGreatHall.name: SWGreatHall

Divination.name: Divination
Divination.description: You are in the Divination classroom. There is a strong odor of tea. Crystal balls are scattered around on tiny, fabric covered tables. There is a ladder set in the floor.
